dcterms:description: A simple model for unsupervised topic mining where each text is assumed to deal with a unique topic.
dcterms:title: Single Topic Model

dcterms:description: A generative probabilistic model for collections of discrete data, where each document can be represented as a mixture of topics.
dcterms:title: Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA)

dcterms:creator: D. Alighieri
dcterms:description: An Italian epic poem that describes the journey of the main character, Dante, through the afterlife.
dcterms:title: Dante’s Divina Commedia

dcterms:description: A collection of speeches delivered by the President of the United States to a joint session of Congress, outlining the government's agenda.
dcterms:title: State of the Union Addresses

dcterms:description: Data generated for testing algorithms, typically used to evaluate performance in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing video clips with 13 joints annotated in all frames, including head, shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips, knees, and ankles.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. Zufﬁ
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for action recognition, containing video clips with annotated actions.
dcterms:title: Sub-JHMDB Dataset
